colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI'I BGAG LHOG DANG, SHU PA DANG GA-YA' DANG, MTSAN PAR RDOL BA DANG MDZE DANG PHOL MIG DANG BAS LDAGS DANG, ME DPAL DANG GA-YAN PA DANG RIM NAD DANG, 'BRUM NAD THAMS CAD LA SOGS PA'I RAB TU ZHI BAR BYED PA'I BSANGS BYAS PA 'DI NI BOD KYI YUL DU BLO BZANG DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
